column4: hey i've installed lamp with apt-get install lamp-server^, . Anyone know how to enable url rewriting?? the tutorials i found online seem to apply to a different version of apache
anyone familiar with apache on ubuntu? i'm trying to load the url rewrite module and having problems
This will work on apache2: http://corz.org/serv/tricks/htaccess2.php
